body_html:
Agree with @mrry . Google Cloud ML is the better choice for managed TensorFlow service or you can implement the similar one in bare servers with TensorFlow.

Azure ML is not the open-source project and I'm not sure if TensorFlow community could help. Maybe asking Microsoft to support TensorFlow could be more helpful.

body:
Agree with @mrry . Google Cloud ML is the better choice for managed TensorFlow service or you can implement the similar one in bare servers with TensorFlow. 

Azure ML is not the open-source project and I'm not sure if TensorFlow community could help. Maybe asking Microsoft to support TensorFlow could be more helpful.
